title: RelicVeil - Historical Artifacts Tracking Platform
overview: RelicVeil is a modern web application designed for history enthusiasts, collectors, and researchers to document, share, and discover historical artifacts.
features: 🔐 Secure Authentication: Firebase Authentication for secure user management
📝 Artifact Management: Add, update, and delete artifacts with detailed information
❤️ Like System: Interactive like/dislike functionality for artifacts
🔍 Advanced Search: Full-text search across artifact names, descriptions, and locations
📱 Responsive Design: Fully responsive layout for all devices
🌐 Real-time Updates: Dynamic content updates without page refresh
userFeatures: 👤 User Profiles: Personalized user profiles with artifact collections
📋 My Artifacts: Manage your own artifact collection
❤️ Liked Artifacts: Track and access your liked artifacts
🔍 Browse Artifacts: Explore artifacts from other users
📊 Featured Artifacts: Discover trending and popular artifacts

title: Logic Gates Simulator
overview: A comprehensive Logic Gates Simulator built with Java 17, LWJGL, Slick2D, and JNA. Design, simulate, and analyze digital circuits visually with real-time feedback and advanced circuit analysis tools.
features: 🟩 Basic Logic Gates: AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR, XOR, XNOR, Buffer
➕ Arithmetic Components: Half/Full Adders & Subtractors
🔢 Data Processing: Encoders (4-to-2, 8-to-3), Decoders (2-to-4, 3-to-8)
⚖️ Comparators: 1-bit and 2-bit with full comparison outputs
🔀 Multiplexers/Demultiplexers: 2-to-1, 4-to-1, 1-to-2, 1-to-4
⏱️ Sequential Logic: D, JK, SR, T Flip-Flops, Clock Generator
📊 Circuit Analysis: Truth Table, Boolean Equation, Timing Diagram, Karnaugh Map (Quine-McCluskey)
💾 Save/Load: Custom .lgsworld format with versioning
📋 Clipboard: Multi-gate selection, copy, paste with connections
🖱️ Visual Design: Drag-and-drop, real-time simulation, wire connections
🔍 Zoom & Pan: Mouse wheel zoom, drag pan for large circuits
⌨️ Keyboard Shortcuts: Ctrl+C/Ctrl+V for copy/paste
🌐 Cross-platform: Windows, Linux, macOS
userFeatures: 👤 Visual circuit design with drag-and-drop interface
🧮 Automatic truth table and Boolean equation generation
🗺️ Karnaugh map simplification for logic optimization
🔎 Zoom and pan for large circuit navigation
